text.div:
BC Independent Logical Model

Base class for classes in CIMI that include enough context to stand alone. Analogous to FHIR's DomainResource.

name: IndependentModel
title: BC Independent Logical Model
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC)
description: Base class for classes in CIMI that include enough context to stand alone. Analogous to FHIR's DomainResource.

element.definition: Base class for classes in CIMI that include enough context to stand alone. Analogous to FHIR's DomainResource.

element.short: Workaround for limitation in IG publisher: StructureDefinitions must have at least one field
